row.scheme: ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; PaperSize (let ((size "A4") (orientation "portrait")) (set! size (d-GetOption (string-append "a4" stop "letter" stop))) (set! orientation (d-GetOption (string-append (_ "Portrait") stop (_ "Landscape") stop))) (if (equal? orientation (_ "Portrait")) (set! orientation " ") (set! orientation " 'landscape")) (d-DirectivePut-score-prefix "PaperSize" (string-append "#(set-default-paper-size \"" size "\"" orientation")\n")) (d-DirectivePut-score-override "PaperSize" DENEMO_OVERRIDE_GRAPHIC) (d-DirectivePut-score-display "PaperSize" (string-append (_ "Paper Size =") size orientation)) (d-RefreshDisplay))
row._tooltip: Specifies how the printed page should be.
